org.agilewiki.jactor2.util

Class ContinuationEvent<RESPONSE_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messaging.Event<Actor>
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.ContinuationEvent<RESPONSE_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    RESPONSE_TYPE - The type of response.

     class ContinuationEvent<RESPONSE_TYPE>
extends Event<Actor>
    The request used to pass the response and the wrapped ResponseProcessor back to the original target mailbox.
